name: More Candy Unlimited - Cool Tile Puzzle Candies Matching Game FREE
name_original: More Candy Unlimited - Cool Tile Puzzle Candies Matching Game FREE
description:
********* Free Candy Puzzle Game! ************

******** Hours of Sweets Flipping Fun ***********

Stop yourself from drooling from this awesome candy logic game that is sure to get you hooked!

This game brings out your favorite candies to life with physics and visuals that are fun and dynamic. Enjoy yummy designs and rich eye candy in every logically challenging stage. To win, simply flip your way through various levels in this delicious puzzle adventure.

Get your hands on the sweetest game ever!

Features:

* Simplistic user interface
* Cute and colorful graphics
* Play with your friends
* Multiple difficulty levels
* Fun for all ages

Indulge your sweet tooth craving!

Download FREE Today!
